articles.author: Brian Bushard
articles.title: Billionaire Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Hits Record $157 Billion Cash — But Loses On Investments - Forbes
articles.description: Berkshire Hathaway reported a record cash pile but also a more than $20 billion investment loss for the third quarter.
articles.content: Billionaire investor Warren Buffetts Berkshire Hathaway reported a record $157.2 billion cash pile Saturday morning amid a surge in operating profit, as the conglomerates shares continue to climb, wh… [+2253 chars]
